txt.en:
'Hello, friend [placeholder]. You have become a burglar of no small skill, but you and I both know that is not enough. An adequate burglar is simply not good enough if the task calls for an accomplished burglar, after all!

'It might not be too late. I have heard of just such an accomplished burglar, and it could be that he can give you the advice you need to become more than just adequate!

'Then again, he might not. But there's no harm in trying! Look for Atherol Took at Adso's Camp, west of Bree, between here and Buckland. If you have it in you to become a truly accomplished burglar, Atherol Took might be able to tease it out of you!'

'Hello, friend [placeholder]. You have become a burglar of no small skill, but you and I both know that is not enough. An adequate burglar is simply not good enough if the task calls for an accomplished burglar, after all!

'Then again, he might not. But there's no harm in trying! Look for Atherol Took at Adso's Camp, between the town of Bree and Buckland. If you have it in you to become a truly accomplished burglar, Atherol Took might be able to tease it out of you!'
A Thief in the Night

'Hello, friend [placeholder]. You have become a burglar of no small skill, but you and I both know that is not enough. An adequate burglar is simply not good enough if the task calls for an accomplished burglar, after all!

'It might not be too late. I have heard of just such an accomplished burglar, and it could be that he can give you the advice you need to become more than just adequate!

'Then again, he might not. But there's no harm in trying! Look for Atherol Took in Breeland, at Adso's Camp. You'll find the camp between the town of Bree and Buckland. If you have it in you to become a truly accomplished burglar, Atherol Took might be able to tease it out of you!'

'Greetings, Burglar [placeholder]. I will forgive you for spoiling my imminent theft of that delicious roast cooking over there, since you might be able to help me with something.

'I have learned that a small group of brigands plan to sneak onto old Maggot's farm in the Marish to steal some of his prized mushrooms. The mushrooms are a real delicacy, and it would be a shame if the brigands deprived poor old Maggot of them.

'After all, if anyone is going to be sneaking mushrooms, it should be us! Am I right?'

<rgb=#FF0000>This is a Solo quest, and cannot be completed with a Fellowship.</rgb>

'Hello, friend [placeholder]. You have become a burglar of no small skill, but you and I both know that is not enough. An adequate burglar is simply not good enough if the task calls for an accomplished burglar, after all!

'Then again, he might not. But there's no harm in trying! Look for Atherol Took in Breeland, at Adso's Camp. You'll find the camp on the Great East Road, between Bree and Buckland. If you have it in you to become a truly accomplished burglar, Atherol Took might be able to tease it out of you!'
'You'll find Atherol Took at Adso's Camp, west of the town of Bree and east of Buckland. He might be able to give you some instruction.'

Atherol Took, a very accomplished burglar, is at Adso's Camp, west of the town of Bree.\n\nYou have been told to speak with Atherol Took if you wish to become a better burglar.
'You'll find Atherol Took at Adso's Camp, west of the town of Bree and east of Buckland. He might be able to give you some instruction.'

Atherol Took is at Adso's Camp on the Great East Road, between Bree and Buckland.\n\nAtherol is waiting to speak with you about your expedition to Farmer Maggot's farm.

Talk to Atherol Took
'That was a good adventure, [placeholder].'
Bring Maggot's Mushrooms to Atherol Took
'Any night that ends with a mushroom feast is a good night, if you ask me!'
'My dogs flushed out one of the Big Folk the other night. After my mushrooms, he was!'
'The brigands are getting more bold. It seems every night my dogs chase 'em away!'

'Hello, friend [placeholder]. You have become a burglar of no small skill, but you and I both know that is not enough. An adequate burglar is simply not good enough if the task calls for an accomplished burglar, after all!

'It might not be too late. I have heard of just such an accomplished burglar, and it could be that he can give you the advice you need to become more than just adequate!

'Then again, he might not. But there's no harm in trying! Look for Atherol Took in Breeland, at Adso's Camp. You'll find the camp east of Buckland, on the road to Bree. If you have it in you to become a truly accomplished burglar, Atherol Took might be able to tease it out of you!'

'Hello, friend [placeholder]. You have become a burglar of no small skill, but you and I both know that is not enough. An adequate burglar is simply not good enough if the task calls for an accomplished burglar, after all!

'It might not be too late. I have heard of just such an accomplished burglar, and it could be that he can give you the advice you need to become more than just adequate!

'Then again, he might not. But there's no harm in trying! Look for Atherol Took in Breeland, at Adso's Camp. You'll find the camp on the Great East Road, between Bree and Buckland. If you have it in you to become a truly accomplished burglar, Atherol Took might be able to tease it out of you!'

'You did a good thing, [placeholder], and Farmer Maggot's delicious mushrooms have been spared from falling into the hands of the Blackwolds, who don't deserve them.

'We, however, certainly do deserve them, and the mushrooms you collected can be our payment from Farmer Maggot for the service we did him. I'm sure he'd be pleased with this arrangement, so there's no need to speak with him about it. No need at all!

'And I think it's clear that you are a very effective burglar -- you certainly handled yourself well around those brigands! They'll fear your shadow from now on, if they have any sense, for you are quite skilled!\q
'What happened to Maggot's mushrooms, [placeholder]?'
Burglars of great skill are not often chanced upon these days, especially if they do not wish to be found.
